title: Road to Perdition supplement - MAD parody - Road to Sedation
description:
<a href="http://www.dvdmadhouse.com/x09236wtm/roadtosedation.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.dvdmadhouse.com/x09236wtm/roadtosedation.jpg</a>



Road to Sedation is the MAD Magazine parody of Road to Perdition.  These scans are from MAD 423, the 50th Anniversary issue.  They&#039;re very high quality, high resolution, and full color. This torrent was inspired by the share of the Road to Perdition graphic novels uploaded by mmdsx and still available by searching demonoid or thepiratebay.
